ValidationRule.description: Coefficient of Discharge is a Mandatory field to be entered by the user.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISBLANK(TEXT( cdcpc__Coefficient_of_Discharge__c )) )&& ( cdcpc__Bypass__c = FALSE)&& ( cdcpc__Sizing_Flag__c = TRUE)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please Select any one of the following.
